query:
SELECT
                id,
                task_type as "task_type: TaskType",
                task_state as "task_state: TaskState",
                sched_datetime
            FROM Tasks
            WHERE task_type = CASE WHEN $1::text IS NULL THEN task_type ELSE $1 END
              OR task_state = CASE WHEN $2::text IS NULL THEN task_type ELSE $2 END
